response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our unique product to you. This product holds significant value to us and we believe it would be a great addition to your collection. Given its worth to us, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. We understand that the product's value to you might be different, but we hope this offer presents a mutually beneficial opportunity. If you're interested, please let us know and we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 12000}
